title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Customer Engagement with WhatsApp Business on AWS (SEC101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用WhatsApp Business扩展客户参与度 (SEC101)
abstract: Customers already rely on WhatsApp every day—now your business can meet them there. In this session, Meta and AWS leaders share how enterprises can quickly and securely set up WhatsApp Business through AWS End User Messaging. Learn how Delhivery, a leading logistics provider in India, uses WhatsApp to deliver time-sensitive updates that improve customer experience and trust. Attendees will leave with practical insights into how messaging can streamline operations, enhance engagement, and unlock new business value. This presentation is brought to you by Meta, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 客户已经每天都在使用WhatsApp——现在您的企业可以在那里与他们会面。在本次会议中，Meta和AWS领导者分享企业如何通过AWS终端用户消息服务快速安全地设置WhatsApp Business。了解印度领先的物流提供商Delhivery如何使用WhatsApp提供时效性更新，从而改善客户体验和信任度。与会者将获得关于消息传递如何简化运营、增强参与度并释放新商业价值的实用见解。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Meta提供支持。

presenter.name: Venky Krishnan
presenter.title: WW GTM Specialist - Communication Developer Services
